functions.tag: {EquipmentType:"rangeWeapon",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"traditional",Effect:"str3_spd1_her2_dar2",display:{Name:"\"§6Frère d'arme d'Amarianne\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Vas avec l'unique archère\"}","{\"text\":\"§7car elle est l'élue de notre mère.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Go with the one archere\"}","{\"text\":\"§7because she is our mother's chosen one.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7SPD§a1 §7HER§a2 §7DAR§a2\"}"]},Damage:50,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:power",lvl:10s},{id:"minecraft:flame",lvl:3s},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.attack_speed,Name:generic.attack_speed,Amount:-0.7,Operation:1,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,50002,0,50001]}]}

{EquipmentType:"rangeWeapon",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"traditional",Effect:"str4_her1_dar1",display:{Name:"\"§6Unkempt Harold\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7J'ai tiré quoi, six fois ? Ou Cinq ?\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Trois ? Sept. Peu Importe.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Did I fire six shots, or only five?\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Three? Seven. Whatever.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a4 §7HER§a1 §7DAR§a1\"}"]},Damage:50,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:power",lvl:8s},{id:"minecraft:multishot",lvl:1s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.attack_speed,Name:generic.attack_speed,Amount:-0.7,Operation:1,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,50002,0,50001]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"delightful",Effect:"str4_has1",display:{Name:"\"§6Soleil de sang\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7L'aurore arbore une teinte écarlate, naissant\"}","{\"text\":\"§7des fomentations du lever  et des immondices de la mort.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The dawn has a crimson hue, born of the fomentations\"}","{\"text\":\"§7of the sunrise and the filth of death.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a4 §7HAS§a1\"}"]},Damage:10,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:projectile_protection",lvl:3s},{id:"minecraft:fire_protection",lvl:3s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:6.06,Operation:0,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,10001,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:0.89,Operation:0,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,20001,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"delightful",Effect:"str3_spd2_has2",display:{Name:"\"§6Umbra métilnuji\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Une diamant parmi les diamants,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7un secours seyant celui d'une déité.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7A diamond among diamonds,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7a deity-like rescue.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7SPD§a2 §7HAS§a2\"}"]},Damage:20,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:projectile_protection",lvl:5s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:11.7,Operation:0,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,10002,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:4.68,Operation:0,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,20002,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"delightful",Effect:"str2_res1_her1",display:{Name:"\"§6Reine de la nuit\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Pleure à jamais dans le plus ténébreux des cauchemars\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et vois naître ta puissance en plus primordial des effrois.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Cry forever in the darkest of nightmares and\"}","{\"text\":\"§7see your power born in the most primordial of frights.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7RES§a1 §7HER§a1\"}"]},Damage:15,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:projectile_protection",lvl:4s},{id:"minecraft:thorns",lvl:4s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:7.47,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,10003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:3.69,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,20003,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"delightful",Effect:"str3_luc1_hun1",display:{Name:"\"§6L'ultime aube\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Jà elle vint et pour la seconde fois\"}","{\"text\":\"§7elle enfanta un jour sans fin.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Already it came and for the second time\"}","{\"text\":\"§7gave birth to an endless day.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§a1\"}"]},Damage:5,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:feather_falling",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:2s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:3.13,Operation:0,Slot:feet,UUID:[I;0,10004,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:2.07,Operation:0,Slot:feet,UUID:[I;0,20004,0,20000]}]}
